EmailTemplate.description: The e-mail template is used to inform the Merchant's Business Contact(s) that a N.M.O. Process has moved on to an N.M.O. 2 Stage.
EmailTemplate.name: N.M.O. Process Entering N.M.O. 2 Legal e-mail (text version)
EmailTemplate.subject: [Onboarding Process] Approval request {!ApprovalRequest.Status}
